data.expected_result: The hashtag will darken indicating you've muted the channel
data.short_description: Muting a channel that isnt a public channel while you're focused on it causes it to appear as if there are no changes until you focus on another channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Mute a channel that not everyone has access to (meaning it has a lock next to the hastag) - Observe the channel - Optional: go to a different channel
